import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64' import moment from 'moment' import { getUsers, updateUser, deleteUser, changeUserStatus } from '../actions/users' const Users = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const dispatch = useDispatch() const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')) const users = useSelector((state) => state.users) const editUser = useSelector((state) => currentId ? state.users.find((e) => e._id === currentId) : null) const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ title : '', message : '', tags : '', selectedFile: '' }) useEffect(() => { if(editUser) setUserData(editUser) },[editUser]) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUsers()) }, [dispatch]) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(currentId){ dispatch(updateUser(currentId, {...userData, name: user?.result?.name})) } else { dispatch(createUser({...userData, name: user?.result?.name})) } clear() } const clear = () => { setCurrentId(null) setUserData({ title : '', message : '', tags : '', selectedFile: '' }) } if(!user?.result?.name) { return(
Please Sign In To continue
